duplicate.title: Duplicate Leads
duplicate.subtitle: Manage duplicate leads identified during data upload
duplicate.searchPlaceholder: Search by phone, email, or batch...
duplicate.infoNote: Leads are grouped by matching phone numbers and/or email addresses. Review each group carefully before merging or deleting records.

messages.mergeAlert: Merging duplicate leads for group {{groupId}}. This will combine all duplicate records into one master record.
